name: The Shop (Polarbear2)
description:
Note - The information provided here may be required for you to play the game.

Quick note  

Click the bell to begin. A random NPC will spawn with the order.  You will need to see whether it matches what you have provided and give them what they need. You will lose time if you guess. So be careful

Please use full Screen...

Charizard coffee 

Tale said in the great pyramid of Giza while they were people raiding the pharaoh he got a mental breakdown. This coffee was crafted by the pharaoh's greatest ancient alchemist to relax their great god.

Orange Bull Coffee

 Tale said in the ancient land of roman Zeus was enjoy his nectar in the sky he enjoy the nectar a bit too much, A drop of the nectar was dropped onto a coffee brewing pot making a new kind of coffee and giving great nourishment to those who drink them. 

 Dark Chocolate Coffee 

Tale said this coffee was made by a random cult who sacrifice a sheep to their god, therefore, giving them a recipe for coffee instead of the immortality they wants.

 

Cookies cookies are yummy
